title: Calculating Mean and Standard Deviation
body: Use the following data (first exam scores) from Susan Dean's spring pre-calculus class: 33; 42; 49; 49; 53; 55; 55; 61; 63; 67; 68; 68; 69; 69; 72; 73; 74; 78; 80; 83; 88; 88; 88; 90; 92; 94; 94; 94; 94; 96; $$100$$.
lesson: 2.7 Measures of the Spread of the Data
